comment: Any chance you guys are going to add cool emblems ? The stars at is really disappointing for me especially since I play hours daily . Would love to represent this game with something cool .
amr:
# ::snt Any chance you guys are going to add cool emblems ? The stars at is really disappointing for me especially since I play hours daily . Would love to represent this game with something cool .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / chance-02

                  :ARG0 (y / you
                        :mod (g / guy))
                  :ARG1 (e / emote
                        :ARG1-of (c2 / cool-04)))
            :ARG2 (a2 / any))
      :snt2 (d / disappoint-01

                  :location (t / there))
            :ARG1 (ii / i)
            :degree (r / really)
            :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (p / play-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :duration (m2 / multiple
                              :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (h / hour)))
                        :frequency (r2 / rate-entity-91
                              :ARG3 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (d2 / day)))
                        :mod (e2 / especially))))
      :snt3 (l / love-02

                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (g2 / game
                        :mod (t4 / this))
                  :ARG2 (s2 / something

comment: Glad you re speaking up about this issue . Game is boring as hell w / o prestiges . There s really nothing to work for .
amr:

comment: I agree . One of my favorite things as a person who has played Call of Duty for years is prestige . I've unlocked every challenge in this game and feel very disappointed .
